comment.author: 17643926@N00
comment._content: This photo is an interesting contrast to other photos in this collection which show wealthy families uptown in Central Park. The sight of these informally dressed immigrants probably looked shockingly disorderly to the American upper classes.

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: The photo was taken during a July, 1911 heat wave that killed 146 New York residents and 600 horses. Story in The New York Times, July 8, 1911: query.nytimes.com/mem/archive-free/pdf?_r=1&res=9505E...

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content:
Another Bain/LOC photo of the heat wave crowd in Tompkins Square Park:
